title: Is the statement 'Nothing is permanent' permanent? - Quora

response.answer_text: Do you mean the statement as writing on a paper, or as a remembered string of words in someone’s mind, or as the sonic travel through the air of a verbal statement, or as a concept rather than a string of words? Or perhaps as a string of vibrations on a radio signal forever traveling across the universe. Which definition of permanent do you use? There are several.
